ovdesc.p: The status on the movement of the bill is defined in this application by the User. Through a report based on this application, the status of the Bill is monitored on a daily basis.
Once the status is defined here, the same can be used in BL.REGISTER / BL.BATCH application.

desc.p: The description of the Status of the Bill has to be defined here.
These status can be used in BL.REGISTER / BL.BATCH which helps to keep track of movement of Bills.
This is id of BL.STATUS file.
